translation.en: [group] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Jennifer ♪
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐 亲爱的詹尼弗

translation.en: [Jennifer] Look at you!
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你！

translation.en: [group] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: [Jennifer] Oh wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: Make a wish. Make a wish!
translation.zh: 许愿！

translation.en: It doesn't feel any different than any other birthday.
translation.zh: 感觉跟其他生日没什么区别

translation.en: -[man] Right. -For those of you who aren't here yet.
translation.zh: 对那些还没到这么大岁数的人来说

translation.en: I really feel like my life is just beginning.
translation.zh: 我真的感觉我的人生才刚刚开始

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪里？

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -Bye, guys. We'll see you in a little bit. -[woman] See you.
translation.zh: -再见 各位 我们一会见 -再见

translation.en: [announcer] The most anticipated and celebrated unofficial holiday
translation.zh: 美国最受期待 最受欢迎的非官方节日

translation.en: in America is finally here.
translation.zh: 终于到了

translation.en: In front of more than 150 million viewers,
translation.zh: 面向一亿五千多位观众

translation.en: it is Super Bowl LIV, and it is live.
translation.zh: 这里是第54届超级碗直播

translation.en: [announcer] The halftime star is already here, Jennifer Lopez.
translation.zh: 中场秀明星已经到场了 詹妮弗·洛佩兹

translation.en: We're in for a treat tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚你一定会大饱眼福

translation.en: [Jennifer] This year, I turn 50.
translation.zh: 今年 我50岁了

translation.en: So many important things have happened to me.
translation.zh: 我经历了很多重要的事情

translation.en: And all of them have led me right here
translation.zh: 这一切让我走到今天这一步

translation.en: to this moment.
translation.zh: 这一刻

translation.en: [Jennifer] My whole life, I've been battling and battling
translation.zh: 在我的一生中 我一直在努力抗争 希望被听到

translation.en: to be heard…
translation.zh: 我一直在努力抗争 希望被听到

translation.en: …to be seen…
translation.zh: 被关注

translation.en: to be taken seriously.
translation.zh: 被认真对待

translation.en: And now I have this incredible opportunity
translation.zh: 此时 我有个绝佳的机会

translation.en: to show the world who I am.
translation.zh: 向世界展示真正的自己

translation.en: How do I represent all of the things that matter to me?
translation.zh: 我要怎样呈现 所有对我重要的东西呢？

translation.en: The world is listening.
translation.zh: 全世界都在聆听

translation.en: What am I gonna say?
translation.zh: 我要说什么？

translation.en: [Jennifer] When I was a little girl, it was always ingrained in my head
translation.zh: 小时候 我的脑子里就根深蒂固了

translation.en: that I wasn't the singer.
translation.zh: 我不是当歌手的料

translation.en: My sister's the singer, and my other sister was the smart one.
translation.zh: 我姐姐是歌手 我妹妹是聪明的那一个

translation.en: I was either the athlete or the dancer. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我不是运动员就是舞者

translation.en: So I wasn't smart or could sing.
translation.zh: 所以我既不聪明也不会唱歌

translation.en: [laughing] Right?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: In my mind, always has, whenever anybody asked me,
translation.zh: 我记得 不管别人什么时候问我

translation.en: "Can you sing?" I'd go, "No."
translation.zh: “你会唱歌吗？” 我都说：“不会”

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get up! I'm gonna get out! ♪
translation.zh: 我要向上！我要出去！

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get up, get out, and do it! ♪
translation.zh: 我要向上 出去 全力争取！

translation.en: [Jennifer] When I was growing up, my mom was very into musicals.
translation.zh: 从小到大 我妈妈一直都很喜欢音乐剧

translation.en: I always felt, from a very young age,
translation.zh: 从很小开始 我一直觉得

translation.en: that the singing, dancing, acting combination
translation.zh: 唱歌 跳舞 表演的结合

translation.en: was something that I wanted to do.
translation.zh: 是我想做的

translation.en: Because I lived in the Bronx, and it was very kind of like brick
translation.zh: 因为我生活在布朗克斯 那里全是钢筋水泥

translation.en: and gray and brown,
translation.zh: 灰石棕瓦

translation.en: I loved the kind of escape into the musical world.
translation.zh: 我喜欢进入音乐世界 逃离一切的感觉

translation.en: I would probably say West Side Story was my favorite of all time.
translation.zh: 可以说《西区故事》一直是我的最爱

translation.en: It made New York and those barrio neighborhoods
translation.zh: 它给纽约和那些巴里奥街区

translation.en: feel vibrant and beautiful.
translation.zh: 赋予了活力和美丽

translation.en: [Jennifer] I always looked up to Rita Moreno.
translation.zh: 我一直很崇拜丽塔·莫雷诺

translation.en: Seeing someone like me up there was so rare.
translation.zh: 能在舞台上看到我这样的人 真是太难得了

translation.en: ♪ You forget I'm in America ♪
translation.zh: 你忘了我在美国

translation.en: [Jennifer] I wanted to be like her. I wanted to be on that stage too.
translation.zh: 我想跟她一样 我也想登上那个舞台

translation.en: I fell in love with dance,
translation.zh: 我爱上了舞蹈

translation.en: and it totally distracted me from any type of school.
translation.zh: 但它让我和各种类型的学校都绝缘了

translation.en: My mom was like, "If you're gonna live in this house, you're gonna get your education."
translation.zh: 我妈妈说：“如果你住在这个家里 就要接受教育”

translation.en: So we got into a bad fight one night… and I just left.
translation.zh: 有天晚上我们大吵一架… 我离家出走了

translation.en: I was 18.
translation.zh: 当时我18岁

translation.en: I was a gypsy from the minute I left my mom's house.
translation.zh: 一离开妈妈的房子 我就成了流浪舞者

translation.en: I did little gigs around town.
translation.zh: 我在城里参加一些小演出

translation.en: They would hire dancers for like 25, 50 dollars.
translation.zh: 他们会花 25、50美元雇舞者

translation.en: One of the auditions that came up was Fly Girl on In Living Color.
translation.zh: 其中一个试镜 是《活色生香》里的飞舞少女

translation.en: [man] From boogie down Bronx, Jennifer Lopez.
translation.zh: 来自摇滚小镇布朗克斯的 詹妮弗·洛佩兹

translation.en: [Jennifer] I went from being a dancer to taking acting classes.
translation.zh: 我从舞蹈演员变成了上表演课的人

translation.en: I remember I couldn't even get anybody to represent me as an actor.
translation.zh: 我当演员甚至都找不到经纪人

translation.en: I was like, "No, I'm an actor! Seriously, I'm an actress!" [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我说：“不 我是演员！ 真的 我是个演员！”

translation.en: They're like, "You're a dancer." I'm like, "No."
translation.zh: 他们说：“你是个舞者” 我说：“不”

translation.en: "I'm an actress." [laughs]
translation.zh: “我是演员”

translation.en: -[Jennifer] Hi. -[boy] Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[boy] Oh, gross! Oh, lipstick, I hate lipstick.
translation.zh: 恶心！口红 我讨厌口红

translation.en: -[man laughs] -[Jennifer] I don't wanna be too made-up.
translation.zh: 我不想化太浓的妆

translation.en: -Skin, like clear. -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh: -皮肤要干净 -好的

translation.en: Let's be honest. I'm playing a lot younger than myself.
translation.zh: 说实话吧 我扮演的角色比我年轻多了

translation.en: When I got Hustlers, it was exciting.
translation.zh: 我接到《舞女大盗》的时候很兴奋

translation.en: It was gritty. It had substance.
translation.zh: 那个角色很坚毅 很有内容

translation.en: That's something that I fought for in my career.
translation.zh: 这是我职业生涯的奋斗目标

translation.en: [woman] You're gonna like this pole a lot.
translation.zh: 你会非常喜欢这杆子的

translation.en: -This is your pole? -This is my pole.
translation.zh: -这是你的杆子吗？ -这是我的杆子

translation.en: So it's a little older, but it has a coating on it.
translation.zh: 有点旧了 但是上面有一层涂层

translation.en: -Okay. -It's really easy to hold onto.
translation.zh: -好的 -很容易抓

translation.en: [woman] So it'll be easy for training purposes.
translation.zh: 所以训练的时候很简单

translation.en: [Jennifer] This is a film about women who had limited options
translation.zh: 在这部讲述女性的电影中 她们选择有限

translation.en: and had to make hard choices.
translation.zh: 又必须做出艰难的选择

translation.en: These characters remind me of women I knew growing up in the Bronx. -Whoo! -[woman] There you go.
translation.zh: 这些角色让我想到 从小到大 我在布朗克斯认识的那些女性

translation.en: Nice, nice, nice. Straighten that left leg. Yep.
translation.zh: 很好 伸直你的身体 对

translation.en: You're gonna release. Yes, that's enough.
translation.zh: 你要松开了 可以了

translation.en: Put your hands down on the floor. Take that other leg off, and you're there.
translation.zh: 把手放到地板上 把腿松开就好了

translation.en: -It's super painful. -[woman laughs]
translation.zh: 超级痛

translation.en: Because it's… like, it is a crash course.
translation.zh: 因为这是速成课

translation.en: I've never been bruised like this for anything I've done.
translation.zh: 我从来没有因为其他事情 淤青得这么严重

translation.en: Hustlers was an insanely difficult project to set up.
translation.zh: 《舞女大盗》是个很难筹备的项目

translation.en: It's a complicated story about power and greed
translation.zh: 这是个复杂的故事 关乎权利、贪欲

translation.en: and a group of diverse women
translation.zh: 还有一群多元化的女性

translation.en: who wanted their piece of the American dream.
translation.zh: 她们想争取自己的美国梦

translation.en: And it almost didn't get made.
translation.zh: 这部电影差点就没拍成

translation.en: -[costume director] Here we go, guys. -I want this to be a moment.
translation.zh: -好了 各位 -我希望这是个关键的时刻

translation.en: [Jennifer] Hollywood is run by men.
translation.zh: 好莱坞是男人说了算的

translation.en: They have ideas about what's gonna sell and what's not gonna sell and…
translation.zh: 他们什么类型的片子卖不卖座 有自己的想法…

translation.en: We're trying to change that.
translation.zh: 我们试图改变这一点

translation.en: [Jennifer] As a producer, one of my goals is to make movies that entertain people
translation.zh: 作为制片人 我的目标之一 是拍出让大家喜欢的电影

translation.en: but that also have something to say.
translation.zh: 但电影也要有内容可以表达

translation.en: No, baby, this game is rigged.
translation.zh: 不 宝贝 这游戏有人暗箱操作

translation.en: And it does not reward people who play by the rules.
translation.zh: 而且守规矩的人得不到奖励

translation.en: You either gotta stand in the corner or get in the ring.
translation.zh: 要么站在角落 要么加入游戏

translation.en: I think it's especially hard to get movies made about women
translation.zh: 如果剧情讲的是 女人做一些有争议的事情

translation.en: doing questionable things.
translation.zh: 这种电影很难拍

translation.en: Wanted to empathize with kind of all of us
translation.zh: 我想和所有那些反抗这个不正常的

translation.en: who are up against this broken value system
translation.zh: 价值体系的人们产生共鸣

translation.en: and show these women in a different light.
translation.zh: 以一种全新视角来展示这些女性

translation.en: Having all women on the set, it's definitely a different experience.
translation.zh: 片场全部是女人 绝对是个不同的体验

translation.en: Not something that happens every day in Hollywood.
translation.zh: 这种事在好莱坞并不常见

translation.en: I've done 40 movies, something like that,
translation.zh: 我拍了40部电影 这种情况

translation.en: and it's never happened.
translation.zh: 是前所未有的

translation.en: [host] Toronto International Film Festival is where many Oscar races begin.
translation.zh: 多伦多国际电影节 是很多奥斯卡角逐的开始

translation.en: There have been many, many films garnering attention this week,
translation.zh: 这周有很多吸睛的电影

translation.en: but there's one…
translation.zh: 但是有一部…

translation.en: We've been anticipating the release of Hustlers…
translation.zh: 我们一直在期待 《舞女大盗》的上映…

translation.en: That's my favorite of all of the outfits. Just feels so, like, movie star.
translation.zh: 这是我最喜欢的服装 感觉像个电影明星一样

translation.en: What are we talking about for the premiere?
translation.zh: 我们在首映式上说什么？

translation.en: -[Jennifer] I like the yellow. -[man] You like the yellow? Oh wow, good.
translation.zh: -我喜欢黄色那一件 -你喜欢黄色的？哇 太好了

translation.en: [woman] It's day three of the festival, and we are here
translation.zh: 今天是电影节的第三天 我们在《舞女大盗》的全球首映式上

translation.en: at the world premiere of Hustlers.
translation.zh: 我们在《舞女大盗》的全球首映式上

translation.en: [Jennifer] When you work on something from its inception,
translation.zh: 当你从头开始就做某件事

translation.en: you don't give up on it, and then people finally get to see it.
translation.zh: 没有放弃 大家最终看到的时候

translation.en: It's nerve-racking, but we know we have something good.
translation.zh: 这会让人很紧张 但我们知道我们的作品很优秀

translation.en: [woman] How does it feel, mama?
translation.zh: 感觉如何 妈妈？

translation.en: -Hey, baby, you were trying to call me? -[Elaine] Listen to Vanity Fair.
translation.zh: -嘿 宝贝 你给我打电话了吗？ -你听听《名利场》的评价

translation.en: "Jennifer Lopez dominates in a quintessentially American story."
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹在 一个典型的美国故事中独挑大梁

translation.en: Rotten Tomatoes says Hustlers' first review is,
translation.zh: 烂番茄对《舞女大盗》的 第一个评价是

translation.en: "Jennifer Lopez is Oscar-worthy."
translation.zh: “詹妮弗·洛佩兹值得斩获奥斯卡”

translation.en: [man] Oscar!
translation.zh: 奥斯卡！

translation.en: -[laughs] -[man] You skipped by that one, Elaine.
translation.zh: 你跳过了这个 伊莱恩

translation.en: [woman] We're ready, honey.
translation.zh: 我们准备好了 亲爱的

translation.en: -We're on the way to the Oscar. -Stop!
translation.zh: -我们在去奥斯卡的路上 -别说了！

translation.en: -[woman] Si! [chuckling] -You're making me nervous.
translation.zh: -好的！ -你都让我紧张了

translation.en: -Tom Hanks! -Tom Hanks!
translation.zh: -汤姆·汉克斯！ -汤姆·汉克斯！

translation.en: -[indistinct shouting] -I don't have any lip gloss.
translation.zh: 我没涂唇彩

translation.en: Am I allowed to stand over there?
translation.zh: 我可以站在那边吗？

translation.en: I'm on a group text. My mom, my dad.
translation.zh: 我要发短信给我妈妈 我爸爸

translation.en: -And my two sisters. -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh: -还有我的两个姐妹 -对

translation.en: "Happy Sunday, guys. Go Jets! Love you always." Dad.
translation.zh: “周日快乐 各位 加油喷气机队！” “永远爱你” 爸爸

translation.en: "Good morning." Leslie.
translation.zh: “早上好” 莱斯丽说

translation.en: "Woo-hoo." Lupe.
translation.zh: “呜呼” 卢佩说

translation.en: "I have my Jets jersey on. I'm rooting on my team. Go Jets."
translation.zh: “我穿上我的喷气机队队服了 我要支持我喜欢的队 加油 喷气机”

translation.en: Leslie. "Jets--" That was my mom.
translation.zh: 莱斯丽说“喷气机队…” 是我妈妈发的

translation.en: "Jets, Jets, Jets."
translation.zh: “喷气机队”

translation.en: Linda. "Hi, Dad."
translation.zh: 琳达说：“嗨 爸爸”

translation.en: "Hi, everybody. Go Jets."
translation.zh: “嗨 各位 喷气机队加油”

translation.en: "Jen had her film premiere last night for Hustlers in Toronto."
translation.zh: “詹的《舞女大盗》 昨晚在多伦多首映了”

translation.en: "And look at what they're saying." And she sent that thing there.
translation.zh: “看看他们说了什么” 他把那东西发到了这里

translation.en: My dad goes, "Whoa, that's awesome. Make it happen."
translation.zh: 我爸爸说：“哇 好棒 加油”

translation.en: My mother goes, "Yeah, just recovered a fumble. Go Jets."
translation.zh: 我妈妈说：“刚刚掉球回抢了 加油喷气机队”

translation.en: "We need a freaking kicker."
translation.zh: “我们需要个靠谱的踢球手”

translation.en: Leslie. "Yeah. Stephen called the missed extra point."
translation.zh: 莱斯丽： “是的 斯蒂芬错过了一个附加分“

translation.en: Lupe. "I did too."
translation.zh: 卢佩：“我也是”

translation.en: I'm just gonna write, "Go Jets."
translation.zh: 我就发：“加油 喷气机队”

translation.en: [reporter 1] The NFL facing backlash in the wake of player protest
translation.zh: 在四分卫科林·卡佩尼克 引发一场运动之后

translation.en: after quarterback Colin Kaepernick sparked a movement.
translation.zh: 全国橄榄球联盟 面对着球员抗议的强烈反弹

translation.en: The president arguing that NFL owners should get together
translation.zh: （特朗普：这和种族毫无关系） 总统声称全国橄榄球联盟的老板们 应该团结起来

translation.en: and do something about NFL players
translation.zh: 总统声称全国橄榄球联盟的老板们 应该团结起来 为唱国歌时跪下的

translation.en: that kneel down during the national anthem.
translation.zh: 全国橄榄球联盟的球员做些什么

translation.en: [Trump] Wouldn't you love to see one of these NFL owners
translation.zh: 你不希望看到 全国橄榄球联盟的某位老板说

translation.en: to say, "Get that son of a bitch off the field"?
translation.zh: “让那个混蛋离开比赛场地”吗？

translation.en: [Sanchez] He says that this is purely about people respecting the flag.
translation.zh: 他说这纯粹是为了表现 大家对国旗的尊重

translation.en: To many of the players, this is about race.
translation.zh: 但是对很多球员来说 这确实和种族相关

translation.en: [reporter 1] The ongoing controversy taking a toll
translation.zh: 持续的争议在去年的超级碗中场秀上

translation.en: on last year's Super Bowl halftime show.
translation.zh: 造成了不良影响

translation.en: [reporter 2] The league says, "The artists will let their show do the talking."
translation.zh: 联盟表示： “艺术家们会以表演的形式发声”

translation.en: It was clear that the NFL was having public image concerns
translation.zh: 很明显 国家橄榄球联盟 对种族代表的

translation.en: about racial representation.
translation.zh: 公众形象很关心

translation.en: So the commissioner brought in Roc Nation to advise.
translation.zh: 所以局长让摇滚国度给出了建议

translation.en: It was actually really late for them to pick a performer.
translation.zh: 其实他们选表演者的时候很晚了

translation.en: So it was weird. Something weird was happening.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 那时候发生了很奇怪的事

translation.en: Do you plan to be in Miami for the Super Bowl this year?
translation.zh: 你今年打算去迈阿密 在超级碗上表演吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know anything yet.
translation.zh: 我还什么都不知道

translation.en: There's a rumor that you might perform at the halftime show.
translation.zh: 有传言说你可能会在中场秀上表演

translation.en: Yeah. [laughs]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: The Super Bowl is the biggest stage in entertainment. Period, bar none.
translation.zh: 超级碗是娱乐业最大的舞台 没有之一

translation.en: This is something I have been working for and hoping for for years.
translation.zh: 这是我多年以来的目标和期望

translation.en: [host] Are you performing at the Super Bowl this year?
translation.zh: 你今年要在超级碗上表演吗？

translation.en: Okay, if you… if you don't wanna answer…
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你不想回答…

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [Hoda Kotb] Okay! That was not a "no."
translation.zh: 好的！你没回答“不是”

translation.en: [Jennifer] This is gonna be the year. It's in Miami. They want a Latina.
translation.zh: 就是今年了 今年在迈阿密举办 他们想用拉丁裔

translation.en: And it looked like I was the front-runner.
translation.zh: 看来我是领跑者

translation.en: [reporter 3] After months of rumors, it was confirmed that Jennifer Lopez
translation.zh: 几个月的谣言后 经确认 詹妮弗·洛佩兹

translation.en: will perform the Super Bowl halftime show in February.
translation.zh: 几个月的谣言后 经确认 詹妮弗·洛佩兹 将会在二月的超级碗中场秀上表演

translation.en: But the twist that no one saw coming is she'll be joined by Shakira.
translation.zh: 但是没人预料到的转折是 她将会和夏奇拉共同表演

translation.en: [Benny] Typically, you have one headliner at a Super Bowl.
translation.zh: 通常情况下 超级碗只有一个主角

translation.en: That headliner constructs the show.
translation.zh: 主角造就这场表演

translation.en: Um, and should they choose to have other guests,
translation.zh: 如果他们选择了邀请其他嘉宾

translation.en: that's their choice.
translation.zh: 那是他们的选择

translation.en: It was an insult to say you needed two Latinas
translation.zh: 两个拉丁裔演员

translation.en: to do the job that one artist historically has done.
translation.zh: 完成历史上一个艺人就能完成的工作 是种耻辱

translation.en: Let me get… let me get that little handkerchief.
translation.zh: 把那块小眼镜布给我

translation.en: [Benny] Jamie called me again this morning… -[Jennifer] Uh-huh. -…and said that Shakira had called.
translation.zh: 杰米今天又给我打电话说 夏奇拉打过电话

translation.en: And she was, uh, very sort of up
translation.zh: 她很喜欢

translation.en: and very open to the idea of the… of the double intro
translation.zh: 而且对双主角的想法很开放

translation.en: and had a couple of ideas she actually really wants to throw out--
translation.zh: 她有几个想法想说…

translation.en: The more we can kind of, like, know what each other's thinking…
translation.zh: 我们越了解对方的想法…

translation.en: [Benny] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: …the easier it's gonna be and the more at ease we'll both be.
translation.zh: …就越容易 我们双方就越安心

translation.en: -[Shakira] Hello. -[Jennifer] Hi, baby. How are you?
translation.zh: -你好 -嗨 亲爱的 你好吗？

translation.en: [Shakira] Good, good. Are you working?
translation.zh: 很好 你在工作吗？

translation.en: I did a night shoot last night, so I'm just waking up.
translation.zh: 我昨晚有夜拍 所以我刚醒

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Shakira] Oh my God. I don't know how you do it.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 我都不知道你怎么做到的

translation.en: Listen, I know that the Super Bowl people want us to be weaved throughout the show.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道超级碗的人 想让我们交替表演

translation.en: I haven't had a confirmation about how many minutes I'm gonna have.
translation.zh: 我还没确认我要表演多少分钟

translation.en: Okay. Okay, let me address that really quick. They said 12 minutes.
translation.zh: 好的 我尽快说清楚 他们说12分钟

translation.en: I got kind of a good confirmation that… [chuckles] …we could have an extra minute or two.
translation.zh: 我得到了一个很确认的消息 我们可以多表演一两分钟

translation.en: So now we're at, like, 13, 14 minutes.
translation.zh: 所以我们的表演是13或14分

translation.en: I think, Shakira, what we should have is you should have half the time, and I--
translation.zh: 我觉得 夏奇拉 我们应该让你表演半场 我…

translation.en: [Shakira] 13, 14 minutes between the two of us?
translation.zh: -我们俩各自13、14分吗？ -不…

translation.en: -No-- Yeah-- -[Shakira] In general? Ah, okay. Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们俩各自13、14分吗？ -不… -总共吗？ -没错… -好吧 -整场表演

translation.en: For the whole show.
translation.zh: -好吧 -整场表演

translation.en: If it was gonna be a double headliner, they should've given us 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 如果是双主角 我们应该有20分钟

translation.en: [laughs] You know what I mean? That's what they should've fucking done.
translation.zh: 你知道我的意思吗？ 他们应该这样安排

translation.en: There's an amazing opportunity here
translation.zh: 我们有个绝佳的机会

translation.en: to show who we are as performers
translation.zh: 展示自己的艺术造诣

translation.en: but also show who we are as a community and also show the--
translation.zh: 而且也能展示我们这个群体 还能展示…

translation.en: Bring the world together.
translation.zh: 我们可以让世界团结起来

translation.en: We can bring everybody together in this moment.
translation.zh: 在那个时刻 我们可以将所有人凝聚在一起

translation.en: There's a lot at stake for me as a Super Bowl performer.
translation.zh: 参加超级碗表演 我承担了很多风险

translation.en: You get to not just show people what you do as an artist,
translation.zh: 因为我不仅有机会 展示自己作为艺人的才能

translation.en: but you also have this opportunity to say something bigger.
translation.zh: 还有机会为更重要的事情发声

translation.en: You write so many songs about love.
translation.zh: 你写了很多关于爱情的歌曲

translation.en: -[Jennifer] Oh Lord. -How many?
translation.zh: -天啊 -多少？

translation.en: -All of them are about love. -[Hoda] All of them. Yeah.
translation.zh: -都是关于爱情的 -全都是

translation.en: Some people write about politics and social issues and-- [laughs]
translation.zh: 有些人写政治和社会主题的歌…

translation.en: [Hoda] No, thank you.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢

translation.en: [Jennifer] I'm not into politics. I'm not that person,
translation.zh: 我对政治不感冒 我不是那种人

translation.en: but I was living in a United States that I didn't recognize.
translation.zh: 但我生活在一个我都不认得的美国

translation.en: I was afraid for my kids, for their future.
translation.zh: 我为我的孩子们还有他们的未来担心

translation.en: [crowd] Build that wall!
translation.zh: 建高墙！

translation.en: Build that wall!
translation.zh: 建高墙！

translation.en: Build that wall!
translation.zh: 建高墙！

translation.en: [crowd] No more walls!
translation.zh: 不要竖起高墙！

translation.en: This wall is just another way for him to try to divide the country.
translation.zh: 这堵墙是他试图分裂国家的 另一种方式

translation.en: [Trump] They're bringing drugs.
translation.zh: 他们带来毒品

translation.en: They're bringing crime.
translation.zh: 他们带来犯罪

translation.en: They're rapists.
translation.zh: 他们是强奸犯

translation.en: This is a flat-out invasion.
translation.zh: 这是一次彻底的入侵

translation.en: Inside this old warehouse, the US Customs and Border Patrol
translation.zh: 在这个旧仓库里 美国海关和边境巡逻队

translation.en: is keeping hundreds of immigrant children in cages
translation.zh: 把数百名移民的儿童 关在由金属网制成的

translation.en: created by metal fencing.
translation.zh: 笼子中

translation.en: The cages. The image of the cages for me…
translation.zh: 这些笼子 这些笼子的照片在我看来…

translation.en: I couldn't believe what I was watching.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信自己眼前看到的东西

translation.en: [reporter] Every adult who comes into the country illegally
translation.zh: 每个非法进入这个国家的成年人

translation.en: is sent to see a judge for possible prosecution.
translation.zh: 都被送去见法官 并可能进行起诉

translation.en: And that is when the parent is separated from the child.
translation.zh: 然后父母就会与孩子分离

translation.en: [Jennifer] You don't rip a child from their parents.
translation.zh: 不能强迫孩子和他们的父母分开

translation.en: There's just certain things as a human being you don't do.
translation.zh: 有些事情是人类不该做的

translation.en: What is my message, and what do I stand for?
translation.zh: 我要传达的讯息是什么？ 我的立场是什么？

translation.en: It made me realize that I have a responsibility to not be quiet,
translation.zh: 这让我意识到我不该默不作声

translation.en: to not… just leave the politics to everybody else.
translation.zh: 不能…对政治和其他人不管不顾

translation.en: "This year's Super Bowl halftime show is a statement to a divided country,
translation.zh: “今年的超级碗中场秀 是对分化国家的呈现

translation.en: declaring the importance of kindness, inclusivity, and compassion,
translation.zh: 声明善良、包容、同情的重要性”

translation.en: a reminder that we're always stronger, always better together."
translation.zh: “提醒我们团结 总会使我们更强、更好”

translation.en: "Shakira and Jennifer together for the first time in Miami
translation.zh: “夏奇拉和詹妮弗 第一次一起在迈阿密

translation.en: to craft a powerhouse performance that does just that."
translation.zh: 打造强大的表演 以达到此目的”

translation.en: I told her to start thinking about what she wants that last song to be.
translation.zh: 我跟她说了让她开始思考 最后确定的歌是什么

translation.en: She wasn't crazy about "Born in the USA."
translation.zh: 她对“《生在美国》”不是特别热衷

translation.en: I'm not 100% convinced, so I couldn't convince her.
translation.zh: 我不是百分百确认 所以我不能说服她

translation.en: She's like, "I wasn't born in the USA."
translation.zh: 她说：“我不是在美国出生的”

translation.en: I said, "Yeah, but everybody loves to sing that song."
translation.zh: 我说：“没错 但大家都喜欢唱这首歌”

translation.en: And when America is at its best, everybody wants to live in America.
translation.zh: 当美国处于全盛时期时 每个人都想住在美国

translation.en: You also have the right to come here because we're a country of immigrants.
translation.zh: 你也有权来这里 因为我们这里是移民国家

translation.en: That's who we are.
translation.zh: 我们就是如此

translation.en: Bruce Springsteen, white American, saying to me… ♪ She was born in the-- ♪
translation.zh: 布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀 一个美国白人对我说：“她生于…”

translation.en: And I was, and I'm Latin.
translation.zh: 我想 我是拉丁裔

translation.en: That's… that's big. That's big.
translation.zh: 这很重要

translation.en: Because these motherfuckers act like everybody's an immigrant
translation.zh: 那些混蛋表现得好像人人都是移民者

translation.en: who's trying to sneak into the country and who's a criminal.
translation.zh: 都想偷渡来这个国家 都是罪犯

translation.en: 'Cause that's the narrative Trump created, which is bullshit.
translation.zh: 这是特朗普瞎编的言论 都是瞎扯

translation.en: Some of us have been here for years.
translation.zh: 我们有些人在这里待了很多年

translation.en: A lot of those people are just good people who are looking for the American dream.
translation.zh: 很多人都只是寻找美国梦的好人

translation.en: That's all they want.
translation.zh: 他们只想要这些

translation.en: But like I told her, I said if you come up with a better song and a better cameo
translation.zh: 但正如我跟她说的 我说 如果你能出更好的歌 更好的片段

translation.en: to make the statement that we shouldn't be hating on each other…
translation.zh: 能够做出 “我们不应该彼此憎恨”的表态

translation.en: -[man] Yeah, the statement's ready. -…that's the statement.
translation.zh: -对 这种表态是对的 -就是这种态度

translation.en: -[Elaine] Mm-hmm. -That's the statement.
translation.zh: 就是这种态度

translation.en: My parents came from Puerto Rico to New York when they were just kids.
translation.zh: 我爸妈从小就从波多黎各来到纽约

translation.en: Everybody thought there was a better life here.
translation.zh: 大家都觉得这里的生活更好

translation.en: Just… get on a train and come down here with all my big dreams
translation.zh: （布朗克斯） 我坐上火车 携着我重要的梦想来到这里

translation.en: and just… try to make 'em come true.
translation.zh: 我坐上火车 携着我重要的梦想来到这里 努力实现它们

translation.en: Having the upbringing I had, not growing up, like, around the business,
translation.zh: 我在成长过程中 并没有收到这一行的熏陶

translation.en: I know what it is to get up and, you know, get on a train and work hard.
translation.zh: 我知道动身登上火车 去努力打拼的感觉

translation.en: Coming from the Latino community
translation.zh: 出身于拉丁族群

translation.en: and coming from nothing,
translation.zh: 白手起家

translation.en: we've had to push harder than the normal person.
translation.zh: 我们得比普通人更加努力

translation.en: We've had to work harder. We have to prove ourselves over and over.
translation.zh: 我们必须更加发奋 我们要一遍遍证明自己

translation.en: -Happy Thanksgiving. -Morning. Happy Thanksgiving.
translation.zh: -感恩节快乐 -早上好 感恩节快乐

translation.en: -I'm good. How are you? -Happy Thanksgiving.
translation.zh: -我很好 你好吗？ -感恩节快乐

translation.en: [man] On the bottom.
translation.zh: 在底下

translation.en: Linda!
translation.zh: 琳达！

translation.en: Do something with your dog… that you didn't tell me you were bringing.
translation.zh: 好好管管你的狗 你没说你要带它来

translation.en: I'm the one who does the stuffing. Uh…
translation.zh: 填馅的人是我

translation.en: My ex-husband always did the turkey.
translation.zh: 我前夫总是做火鸡

translation.en: I figure about 48 years. I'm doing the same turkey all this time, so…
translation.zh: 我估计也有48年了 我一直在做同样的火鸡

translation.en: Me and my dad usually cook Thanksgiving dinner.
translation.zh: 我和我爸通常会做感恩节晚餐

translation.en: -[Lupe] I taught them how to do it. -My mom doesn't like to cook.
translation.zh: -是我教他们怎么做的 -我妈不喜欢做饭

translation.en: [Lupe] Hey, I need to taste that to see if it's good.
translation.zh: 我要尝尝看好不好吃

translation.en: -[Jennifer] Let me mix this some more. -It's good. It's good.
translation.zh: -等等 我再多搅一下 -很好

translation.en: Take a potato.
translation.zh: 尝尝土豆

translation.en: Too vinegary.
translation.zh: 醋放得太多了

translation.en: -No. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -没有 -就是

translation.en: -No. -Yes, baby.
translation.zh: -没有 -就是 宝贝

translation.en: No. It's delicious.
translation.zh: 没有 很好吃

translation.en: [in Spanish] Too much vinegar.
translation.zh: -醋太多了 -不是

translation.en: [in English] Too much vinegar.
translation.zh: 醋太多了

translation.en: How ironic.
translation.zh: 真讽刺

translation.en: Growing up,
translation.zh: 从小到大

translation.en: I was surrounded by strong,
translation.zh: 我身边都是强大

translation.en: powerful,
translation.zh: 有力量

translation.en: tough women.
translation.zh: 坚强的女人

translation.en: My mom and my grandmother and my aunt, they ran shit. That was it.
translation.zh: 我妈妈 外婆还有阿姨 她们是老大 就这样 她们掌管一切

translation.en: They just… they were in charge.
translation.zh: 她们是老大 就这样 她们掌管一切

translation.en: [Lupe] David and I moved to the Bronx.
translation.zh: 大卫和我搬到布朗克斯

translation.en: It was a fourth-floor walk-up,
translation.zh: 那是个四楼的无电梯公寓

translation.en: and it only had one bedroom.
translation.zh: 只有一间卧室

translation.en: I had my three daughters in that apartment.
translation.zh: 我在那个公寓生了我三个女儿

translation.en: My mom, she's a super complicated person, and she carries a lot of baggage.
translation.zh: 我妈妈是个很复杂的人 她身上有很多责任

translation.en: Her generation was,
translation.zh: 她那一代人的想法是

translation.en: "A man will come along and marry you and take care of you
translation.zh: “男人会来娶女人

translation.en: for the rest of your life and provide for you."
translation.zh: 余生都照顾女人 供养女人”

translation.en: And she had a lot bigger dreams than that.
translation.zh: 但她的梦想远不止于此

translation.en: She dreamt of being an actress.
translation.zh: 她梦想着当演员

translation.en: She wanted us to be independent.
translation.zh: 她希望我们独立

translation.en: Like, "I don't want you guys to ever have to depend on a man for anything."
translation.zh: 比如说：“我不想让你们 为了任何东西依赖一个男人”

translation.en: I always had the highest expectations of them. It wasn't to be critical.
translation.zh: 我一直对她们寄予厚望 这不是关键

translation.en: It was just to show you that you could do better.
translation.zh: 关键是证明她们可以做得更好

translation.en: And Jennifer, she gave me the hardest time, tell you the truth.
translation.zh: 说实话 詹妮弗是最难搞的那个

translation.en: You know, we butted heads a lot.
translation.zh: 我们经常闹得很不愉快

translation.en: [Jennifer] She did what she had to do to survive,
translation.zh: 她做了自己必须做的事情谋求生存

translation.en: and it made her strong,
translation.zh: 这让她变得强大

translation.en: but it also made her tough.
translation.zh: 也让她变得很坚强

translation.en: She beat the shit out of us.
translation.zh: 她经常打我们

translation.en: [Lupe] I was far from the perfect mother, but the one thing I can always say,
translation.zh: 我距离完美的母亲很遥远 但是我可以永远这样说

translation.en: everything I did, I did with their best interest at heart.
translation.zh: 我所做的一切 都是以她们的最大利益为出发点

translation.en: Everybody sit. Everybody sit anywhere you want.
translation.zh: 大家都随便坐

translation.en: [Lupe] I'm glad that she's strong and tough
translation.zh: 她能如此强大我很高兴

translation.en: because you have to be to survive in this business.
translation.zh: 因为在这行生存 这是必须的

translation.en: I'm really grateful for my mom and dad because they taught me to do everything on my own.
translation.zh: 我真的很感谢我的父母 他们教会我一切都要靠自己

translation.en: And I live with those voices in my head.
translation.zh: 我脑袋里一直记着他们的话

translation.en: As a young performer,
translation.zh: 作为一个年轻的表演者

translation.en: every job that I got I did
translation.zh: 每一次的工作机会我都不会错过

translation.en: because there were so many in between that I didn't get.
translation.zh: 因为很多工作我根本得不到

translation.en: Good roles for women of color were very limited,
translation.zh: 有色人种女人的好角色很有限

translation.en: but I just kept grinding and believing
translation.zh: 但我一直钻研 并且始终相信 我会以某种方式

translation.en: that somehow, someway, I would get that shot.
translation.zh: 但我一直钻研 并且始终相信 我会以某种方式 抓住机会

translation.en: [man] I'd like to thank all of you for coming here.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家来到这里

translation.en: This is a really extraordinary event.
translation.zh: 这是个非常特别的活动

translation.en: Uh, I have the great pleasure of introducing to you Jennifer Lopez.
translation.zh: 我很荣幸向大家介绍詹妮弗·洛佩兹

translation.en: [photographer] Jennifer!
translation.zh: 詹妮弗！

translation.en: [Jennifer] Selena was a Tejano singer and a beloved artist
translation.zh: 赛琳娜是一名德哈诺歌手 她是一位受大家喜爱的艺人 并且拥有巨星般的惊人舞台表现力

translation.en: with an amazing stage presence of a superstar.
translation.zh: 她是一位受大家喜爱的艺人 并且拥有巨星般的惊人舞台表现力

translation.en: And, unfortunately, at 23 years old,
translation.zh: 不幸的是 她23岁时

translation.en: she was gunned down by the head of her fan club.
translation.zh: 被粉丝俱乐部的负责人枪杀了

translation.en: It's important to the Latino community because we haven't had
translation.zh: 对拉丁裔族来说 这是件重要的事 因为在好莱坞

translation.en: any big role models in Hollywood.
translation.zh: 我们从未有过影响力如此大的榜样

translation.en: Not huge that have crossed such barriers like she did in our Latin community.
translation.zh: 像她这样跨越巨大障碍的人 在我们拉丁裔中并不多

translation.en: [man] Selena, it's a very entertaining and moving film,
translation.zh: 《赛琳娜》是个非常有娱乐性 非常感人的电影

translation.en: helped by a luminous performance by Jennifer Lopez
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹精彩四射的表演 为其增光添彩

translation.en: who shows an onstage exuberance that quickly wins her lots of fans.
translation.zh: 她在舞台上表现出的热情 很快为她赢得了很多粉丝

translation.en: You're not. Do you know who you are?
translation.zh: 你不是这样 你知道你是谁吗？

translation.en: I can see you.
translation.zh: 我可以看到你

translation.en: You're just Chris.
translation.zh: 你就是克里斯

translation.en: You say it's star-making. It may well be. She is absolutely enchanting in this role.
translation.zh: 你说这是部成名作 可能真的是 她扮演这个角色很迷人

translation.en: [interviewer] You have broken the financial barrier for Latina actresses.
translation.zh: 你打破了拉丁裔女演员的经济障碍

translation.en: You're making a million dollars a picture, breaking a cultural barrier in Hollywood.
translation.zh: 你拍一部电影挣了100万美元 你打破了好莱坞的文化壁垒

translation.en: That's a big deal.
translation.zh: 这是件大事

translation.en: I know. It's a huge deal. I feel like I struck oil this year. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我知道 这是件大事 我感觉我今年真的收获满满

translation.en: Remember how talkative you were in the trunk?
translation.zh: 还记得你在后备箱里话很多吗？

translation.en: Adele said you do that when you're nervous.
translation.zh: 阿黛尔说你紧张的时候 才会那样

translation.en: Oh, she did, did she?
translation.zh: 她告诉你了啊

translation.en: [Jennifer, in character] You kept touching me, feeling my thigh.
translation.zh: 你一直摸我 摸我大腿

translation.en: Jennifer Lopez. That's what we've got. That's what makes it sizzle, Jennifer.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹 她是我们的杀手锏 是她让电影如此精彩 詹妮弗

translation.en: -Casually mention that. You have an album? -Yeah.

translation.en: And after Selena, she wanted to make music.

translation.en: Why can't we do all the things? [laughs]

translation.en: that were presenting themselves.

translation.en: [Benny] She was nonstop.

translation.en: Did you have a plan that it would be on this magnitude?

translation.en: I mean, number one album as well as number one movie.
translation.zh: 第一名的专辑 还有第一名的电影

translation.en: [Elaine] She's a dancer,

translation.en: who became an actor,
translation.zh: 也成为了演员

translation.en: who became a singer,
translation.zh: 也成为了歌手

translation.en: who became a global icon.
translation.zh: 她也成为了全球偶像

translation.en: She's a woman of color
translation.zh: 她是个有色人种女性

translation.en: who had the audacity to pursue her dreams.
translation.zh: 她无畏地追求自己的梦想

translation.en: [reporter 1] In these trying economic times, Jennifer Lopez has taken the art of diva

translation.en: to new heights.

translation.en: [host] J.Lo from the block. Jenny from the block.

translation.en: Sister needs to keep it real, and she's no longer keeping it real.
translation.zh: 女人都需要保持真实 但是她已经不再保持真实了

translation.en: [reporter 2] The revolving door that is Jennifer Lopez's love life.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹的感情生活是旋转门

translation.en: [reporter 3] Hollywood's best known serial bride is at it again.
translation.zh: 好莱坞最著名的连环新娘 又重蹈覆辙了

translation.en: She was a name that could sell papers, that could sell magazines.

translation.en: [reporter 4] What accounts for her roller-coaster history with guys?

translation.en: [Jennifer] No matter what I achieved, their appetite to cover my personal life
translation.zh: 不管我取得了多大成就 他们报道我个人生活的兴趣

translation.en: overshadowed everything that was happening in my career.
translation.zh: 都会盖过我职业生涯中的一切

translation.en: I just had a very low self-esteem.

translation.en: I really believed a lot of what they said, which is I wasn't any good.
translation.zh: 我会相信他们说的很多话 比如说我不够好

translation.en: That I wasn't a good singer, I wasn't a good actress,

translation.en: I wasn't a good dancer, I wasn't good at anything.

translation.en: I just didn't even belong here. Why wouldn't I just go away?

translation.en: I feel like I was in this, like, really abusive dysfunctional relationship.
translation.zh: 我觉得当时自己 处于一段非正常、受虐般的感情中

translation.en: When you're with a guy who tells you, "No, you suck,
translation.zh: 当你跟一个说你很烂、不够好 说你怎样怎样的男人交往时

translation.en: you're not good, you're dah, dah, dah," you feel you have no worth and value.
translation.zh: 当你跟一个说你很烂、不够好 说你怎样怎样的男人交往时 你就会觉得自己没价值

translation.en: If I was in front of Jennifer Lopez and she said, "You can't sing,"
translation.zh: 如果我站在詹妮弗·洛佩兹面前 她说：“你不会唱歌”

translation.en: I'd go, "Neither can you!"
translation.zh: 我会说：“你也不会！”

translation.en: ♪ Burrito, taco, taco! ♪
translation.zh: 墨西哥卷饼塔克！

translation.en: ♪ Burrito, taco, taco, taco! ♪
translation.zh: 墨西哥卷饼塔可！

translation.en: ♪ Don't think just because I got a lot of money ♪

translation.en: We regret to inform you that, uh, we're dropping you from the label.

translation.en: What? Oh no, you di'in't.

translation.en: We want to thank you for all your hard work and "talent."

translation.en: [man] I said to her once, "Doesn't this bother you?"
translation.zh: 我跟她聊过一次： “你不会因为这件事难过吗？”

translation.en: And she said, "I'm Latina. I'm a woman."
translation.zh: 她说：“我是拉丁裔的 我是女人”

translation.en: "I… I expected this. You just don't expect it."
translation.zh: （本·阿弗莱克） “这种事我有心理准备 你不需要”

translation.en: "You expect to be treated fairly."
translation.zh: “你觉得被公平对待理所应当”

translation.en: Here to apologize on their behalf are our script intern, Elon,
translation.zh: 替他们道歉的是 我们的编剧实习生 埃隆

translation.en: who kind of looks like Ben Affleck, and our resident J.Lo, cleaning lady,
translation.zh: 他长得像本·阿弗莱克 以及我们的住院医生J·洛 清洁工

translation.en: Judy Lowenstein.
translation.zh: 朱迪·洛温斯坦

translation.en: [Jennifer] There was many times where I was just, like,
translation.zh: （“不要跟帮佣成为朋友 更别说跟她们结婚了”） 很多次我都想

translation.en: "I just… I think I'm just gonna quit."
translation.zh: “我干脆…我干脆退出演艺圈算了”

translation.en: I had to… really figure out who I was
translation.zh: 我需要… 搞清楚自己是谁

translation.en: and believe in that and not believe anything else.
translation.zh: 相信这件事 而不是别的东西

translation.en: [reporter] Jennifer Lopez might be nominated as best actress.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹可能 会被提名为最佳女演员

translation.en: And the reason that this is news is because, rather cruelly,

translation.en: she has ten Golden Raspberry nominations to her name.
translation.zh: 她有10个金树莓提名

translation.en: So they're saying that she might be able to make it all back

translation.en: by getting an actual Oscar nomination.

translation.en: for her latest role starring in the movie Hustlers.
translation.zh: 因为她最近在《舞女大盗》中 进行了出演

translation.en: Please welcome the one and only Jennifer Lopez!
translation.zh: 请大家欢迎 独一无二的詹妮弗·洛佩兹！

translation.en: Okay. So you got the standing O when you walked in. -Right! -The movie…
translation.zh: 好的 所以你进来的时候 大家都起立鼓掌 这部电影…

translation.en: -The movie… -The movie.
translation.zh: -这部电影… -这部电影

translation.en: …is getting great reviews, and it must be so gratifying to you
translation.zh: …备受好评 你一定很满意

translation.en: because you not only star in the movie, you produced the movie as well.
translation.zh: 因为你不仅出演了电影 还是这个电影的制片人

translation.en: I did. This was a real labor of love. It took us a minute to get it made.
translation.zh: 没错 这部电影是用爱制作的 我们很长时间才完成

translation.en: We knew it would be a fun ride for people and an enjoyable movie.
translation.zh: 我们知道这会成为大家有趣的体验 这会是部赏心悦目

translation.en: And also a movie that makes you think.
translation.zh: 引人思考的电影

translation.en: It goes deeper than what you think it does.
translation.zh: 它比你想象得要更有深度

translation.en: I realized there was a lot riding on me with this role.

translation.en: It was a controversial project and a risky part for me.

translation.en: This was the first time in a long time
translation.zh: 这是我很长时间以来 第一次

translation.en: that I was actually terrified
translation.zh: 这么害怕

translation.en: doing that opening number.
translation.zh: 表演开场曲目

translation.en: I remember thinking, like, even though that's scary,

translation.en: I perform in front of 30,000 people all the time. Three hundred is nothing.

translation.en: This was the first role where there was no hiding
translation.zh: 但是这是第一个我身体所有部分

translation.en: any part of myself.

translation.en: And I had to get up on this stage, not like I do at my concerts

translation.en: with tights and sparkly things on and all that. [laughs]

translation.en: 'Cause I wear sexy costumes. It's not about that. It was different.

translation.en: -[woman] B mark. -[man] And action, everybody.

translation.en: but emotionally as well.

translation.en: [reviewer] It's really, I think, the best work she's done since, like, 2002.
translation.zh: 我觉得那真的是 她从2002年以来最好的作品

translation.en: She had such a great period of films up to that point.
translation.zh: 在那之前她经历了很长的电影生涯

translation.en: And now you're realizing that… you and me ain't good together?

translation.en: [reviewer] Seeing this, we're like, "Oh yeah, I think I forgot

translation.en: what made her such a movie star in the first place."

translation.en: and it's visceral, and I'm looking for a feeling.

translation.en: our culture, our music, and women everywhere.

translation.en: if Emme sings "Born in the USA," as a little, young Latina girl.

translation.en: and then they could come out.

translation.en: It's not about making them more complicated.

translation.en: That's why this part is important that it has the scale. [Tabitha] Right.

translation.en: all sitting in cages, singing, "Ooh," and that all lights up,

translation.en: the scale of that is powerful, and the visual of that is powerful.

translation.en: This is what matters.

translation.en: [crowd chanting] J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo! J.Lo!

translation.en: -Boom, boom, look. -Then we look at each other.

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm gonna live my life ♪
translation.zh: 因为我要过我的生活

translation.en: Do you wanna high-five me?
translation.zh: 你想跟我击掌吗？

translation.en: -How? -Do it with me. Let's figure it out.
translation.zh: -怎么做？ -跟我一起 我们想想

translation.en: ♪ Because I wanna live my life ♪
translation.zh: 因为我想过自己的生活

translation.en: [man 2] At the end of Shakira,

translation.en: we'll put J.Lo in the lift. We'll take her up. Applause, applause, applause, applause, applause.
translation.zh: 我们把J·洛放上楼梯 然后把她举起来 鼓掌

translation.en: You guys slide in. As they exit, you guys are sliding in
translation.zh: 你们进来 他们退场的时候 你们上场

translation.en: and track will start.

translation.zh: 差不多了 我们收拾一下 我们会表演得很完美

translation.zh: 我又不确定我的右脚迈对了

translation.zh: 亚当？

translation.zh: 亚当在哪里？

translation.zh: 嗨 妈妈

translation.zh: 嘿 宝贝

translation.zh: 我在征集请愿书签名 猜猜我今天收集到了多少签名

translation.en: -Ten? -No.
-Twenty? -Nope.
-More? -Mm-hmm. -Thirty? -Mm-mm.

translation.en: -Forty? -A hundred and fifty-six.
-What? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Ooh. -[Jennifer] She's petitioning for a gecko.
translation.zh: 她在为壁虎请愿

translation.en: -[interviewer] A gecko? Is that-- -A tiger-striped geck-- I don't know.
translation.zh: -壁虎？那是… -老虎斑纹的壁…我不知道

translation.en: [crewman] Let's roll sound.
translation.zh: 开始录音吧

translation.en: I look at your film record.
translation.zh: 我看了你的电影纪录

translation.en: Forty films nearly. You've been in a lot of good ones.
translation.zh: 差不多40部电影 你参演了很多好电影

translation.en: You've been in a lot of big box office films.
translation.zh: 你参演了很多高票房电影

translation.en: No Oscar so far.
translation.zh: 你目前还没有奥斯卡奖

translation.en: -No Oscar nomination so far. -No, not yet.
translation.zh: -目前还没有获得奥斯卡提名 -不 还没有

translation.en: Do you think this may change things? Is this the one?
translation.zh: 你觉得这会有所改变吗？ 这次有机会了吗？

translation.en: I mean, I hope so.
translation.zh: 希望如此

translation.en: I hope so.
translation.zh: 希望如此

translation.en: [interviewer] Jennifer Lopez is one of the most recognizable people
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹是这个地球上

translation.en: on the planet.
translation.zh: 最知名的人之一

translation.en: But while she's almost universally successful,
translation.zh: 尽管她在全球都很成功

translation.en: she wasn't always universally respected.
translation.zh: 然而她并不总是被尊重

translation.en: And her relationships with other megastars made her a tabloid fixture,
translation.zh: 她和其他巨星的关系 让她成了小报的常客

translation.en: known as much for her love life as her work.
translation.zh: 她的爱情生活和工作一样出名

translation.en: [Jennifer] I've lived in the public eye.
translation.zh: 我活在公众眼中

translation.en: One of the things I'm proud of is that I'm able to hold it together
translation.zh: 我最骄傲的一件事之一 就是在所有人面前

translation.en: in front of everybody,
translation.zh: 我可以保持冷静

translation.en: without anybody knowing how I feel.
translation.zh: 不让别人知道我的感受

translation.en: Like even now, I'm not gonna get into what my relationships were like.
translation.zh: 即便是现在 我也不想谈我的感情生活

translation.en: But in how it relates to me
translation.zh: 但和我

translation.en: and the journey that I've been on, I had to learn that the key
translation.zh: 还有我的人生旅途相关的是 我必须明白

translation.en: was not so much about other people but about yourself.
translation.zh: 人生的关键和别人关系不大 关键是自己

translation.en: It's about being your own keeper
translation.zh: 关键是要做自己值得珍视的人

translation.en: and not looking for somebody to give you a home
translation.zh: 别想着找个人让他给你一个家

translation.en: but making your own home.
translation.zh: 而是要创造自己的家

translation.en: As an artist, I kind of lost a little bit of who I was
translation.zh: 作为艺人 为了构建完美的生活 居家生活

translation.en: in trying to kind of build a perfect life, a family life.
translation.zh: 我放弃了一部分的自己

translation.en: And when my kids were three…
translation.zh: 我的孩子三岁的时候 我离婚了

translation.en: …I got divorced. I was a single mom with two little kids.
translation.zh: 我的孩子三岁的时候 我离婚了 我成了带两个孩子的单亲妈妈

translation.en: This is so I can remember my daddy.
translation.zh: 这是为了记住我爸爸

translation.en: [Jennifer] At 42,
translation.zh: 42岁的时候

translation.en: movie roles were not knocking down my door.
translation.zh: 电影角色就不再找上门来了

translation.en: As I was getting back to work,
translation.zh: 我回归工作的时候

translation.en: I really felt like I didn't know what my value was anymore.
translation.zh: 真不知道自己的价值是什么了

translation.en: I was doing American Idol.
translation.zh: 我当时录制了《美国偶像》

translation.en: That was the first big job I did after I had the babies.
translation.zh: 那是我生孩子以后 接的第一份重要的工作

translation.en: And it was good for me at that time.
translation.zh: 当时对我有好处

translation.en: People could see me for who I was, and that changed everything.
translation.zh: 人们可以看到我真实的一面 这改变了一切

translation.en: I just love it. I love this whole thing, and I love what it does for singers.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢 我很喜欢整个表演 我很喜欢它对歌手的帮助

translation.en: And I love everything about it, and it's a joy.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这一切 这是种乐趣

translation.en: It's been a joy for me to sit here and watch this for so many years.
translation.zh: 我能坐在这里看很多年表演 是种享受

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Jennifer] I really learned a lot about myself.
translation.zh: 我真的对自己了解了很多

translation.en: I had purpose.
translation.zh: 我有目的

translation.en: And I just felt I've got to work on my acting more,
translation.zh: 我觉得我得多在演戏

translation.en: my singing more, my dancing more, my everything.
translation.zh: 唱歌、舞蹈上 一切东西上下功夫

translation.en: I just need to be better in every way.
translation.zh: 我需要在各方面都变得更好

translation.en: You know, you have those moments in this business where…
translation.zh: 在这一行里 总会有这样的时刻 你会问自己 接下来做什么？

translation.en: you're like, what's next?
translation.zh: 你会问自己 接下来做什么？

translation.en: And will anything be next?
translation.zh: 接下来还有戏唱吗？

translation.en: -[woman] Just a hem? -I don't know that I'd mess with it.
translation.zh: -只有裙摆吗？ -我不知道我会不会弄乱

translation.en: I think every entertainer, every performer, every creative person,
translation.zh: 我觉得每个演艺人员 每个表演者 每个创意人员

translation.en: every artist lives with that fear.
translation.zh: 每个艺人都会生活在这种恐惧之中

translation.en: -Gonna be a roller coaster. -Yeah. It's a bit of a roller coaster.
translation.zh: -要坐过山车了 -对 有点像坐过山车

translation.en: [man] Well, listen, you've got your team. We're all here with you.
translation.zh: 你有你的团队 我们陪着你

translation.en: [Jennifer] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -[Ana] Were you expecting this? -No.
translation.zh: 你有预料到吗？这种压倒性的反应

translation.en: -[Ana] This overwhelming reaction? -I was hoping people would like it.
translation.zh: 你有预料到吗？这种压倒性的反应 我希望人们会喜欢

translation.en: "Most…" This is Glamour magazine.
translation.zh: “大多数…”这是《魅力》杂志的评价

translation.en: "Most of the praise for Hustlers is dedicated to Jennifer Lopez,
translation.zh: “《舞女大盗》的大部分好评 都是给詹妮弗·洛佩兹的

translation.en: who fronts the film as the ringleader Ramona."
translation.zh: 她在电影中扮演领舞者雷蒙娜”

translation.en: "In fact, some reviewers say she could be likely in the running
translation.zh: “有些评论家说 她可能会

translation.en: for her first Academy Award."
translation.zh: 首次参加奥斯卡”

translation.en: "Frankly, it's thrilling to see a criminally underrated performer…
translation.zh: “坦白说 看到这位被严重低估的 表演者从声望很高的电影机构…

translation.en: [tearfully] …get her due from prestige film outlets."
translation.zh: 获得应得的荣誉 真心令人激动”

translation.en: [interviewer] How are you juggling award season, Oscars, Golden Globes,
translation.zh: 你是如何兼顾奥斯卡、金球奖颁奖季

translation.en: with Super Bowl rehearsals?
translation.zh: 和超级碗彩排的？

translation.en: Right. Yeah, I'm a little sore right now. I'm not gonna lie.
translation.zh: 对 我现在是有点肌肉酸痛 这是大实话

translation.en: Trying to parcel out my time,
translation.zh: 我试着把我的时间分成几份

translation.en: flying back and forth from Miami to here on the weekends.
translation.zh: 周末在迈阿密和这里之间来回往返 但是听着

translation.en: And listen, I'm not complaining. It's amazing to have to do that.
translation.zh: 周末在迈阿密和这里之间来回往返 但是听着 我不是在抱怨 能来参加这个活动太棒了

translation.en: Our Best Supporting Actress winner, Jennifer Lopez.
translation.zh: 我们的最佳女配角获奖者 詹妮弗·洛佩兹

translation.en: Thank you so much to the Los Angeles Film Critics Association for this award.
translation.zh: 多谢洛杉矶影评人协会颁发的奖

translation.en: [interviewer] On Monday morning, we have the Oscar nominations.
translation.zh: 周一早上会提名奥斯卡候选人…

translation.en: Are you gonna try to be up, or are you trying to have it come when it comes--
translation.zh: 你会起床看 还是顺其自然…

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no, no. I don't… I don't… I don't… No.
translation.zh: 不 我不…不会

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Call me when it's over.
translation.zh: 结束了再打给我

translation.en: [woman] The nominees for the 92nd Academy Awards were announced this morning.
translation.zh: 今天上午 第92届奥斯卡金像奖提名名单公布

translation.en: [man] For Best Supporting Actress,
translation.zh: 最佳女配角

translation.en: the nominees are Laura Dern in A Marriage Story,
translation.zh: 候选人有 出演《婚姻故事》的劳拉·邓恩

translation.en: Scarlett Johansson for Jojo Rabbit,
translation.zh: 出演《乔乔兔》的斯嘉丽·约翰逊

translation.en: and Margot Robbie in Bombshell,
translation.zh: 出演《突发事件》的玛格特·罗比

translation.en: Florence Pugh in Little Women, and Kathy Bates in Richard Jewell.
translation.zh: 出演《小妇人》的弗洛伦斯·皮尤

translation.en: [host 1] The big shocker was that Jennifer Lopez was nominated for nothing.
translation.zh: 最令人震惊的是詹妮弗·洛佩兹 无缘提名

translation.en: [host 2] Let's talk about the snubs.
translation.zh: 我们谈谈冷门电影吧

translation.en: [host 3] Most obvious, I mean, let's say it, Jennifer Lopez.
translation.zh: 最明显的是詹妮弗·洛佩兹

translation.en: [host 4] Jennifer Lopez. We all expected her to be nominated.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗·洛佩兹 我们都期待她会被提名

translation.en: [reporter 1] Hustlers, one of many movies with a cast of mostly women,
translation.zh: 《舞女大盗》是主演大多为女性的 众多电影之一

translation.en: directed by a woman, that got zero nominations this year.
translation.zh: 导演也是女性 今年却一项提名都没有

translation.en: [reporter 2] Several strong performances by people of color were overlooked.
translation.zh: 几个强有力的有色人种演员被忽略了

translation.en: [reporter 3] When you're voting for someone to win an Oscar,
translation.zh: 投票给奥斯卡获奖者的时候

translation.en: part of the metric is that you have to know that they need it.
translation.zh: 其中一部分衡量标准是 你必须知道他们需要这部电影

translation.en: And with J.Lo, she's already an icon.
translation.zh: J·洛已经是偶像了

translation.en: [Jennifer] It's funny. I didn't sleep well last night.
translation.zh: 很好笑 我昨天没睡好

translation.en: And everybody kept talking about it like, "Tomorrow, tomorrow, tomorrow, tomorrow."
translation.zh: 大家一直都说“明天”

translation.en: And I was just like, can we just stop talking?
translation.zh: 我说 我们能不能别说这件事了？

translation.en: I just feel like, it'll come out tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我说 我们能不能别说这件事了？ 明天就出结果了

translation.en: It's gonna happen. We're gonna be good.
translation.zh: 终归要发生的 我们会没事的

translation.en: I went back to sleep, and I dreamt that it happened.
translation.zh: 我继续睡觉 我梦到会这样了

translation.en: I was like… And when I woke up, I realized it was a dream.
translation.zh: 我就…等我醒来 我意识到那只是个梦

translation.en: So I picked up my phone, and the first thing I saw was Linda, uh…
translation.zh: 我拿起手机 我第一眼看到的就是琳达…

translation.en: She was like, "I hate these fucking people." [chuckles]
translation.zh: 她说：“我讨厌死那些人了”

translation.en: And I was like, "Shit."
translation.zh: 我想：“糟了”

translation.en: They just don't want to give that shit up.
translation.zh: 他们就是不想放弃

translation.en: -They don't. -It kills me.
translation.zh: -没错 -我难受死了

translation.en: [Jennifer] I know. Don't let it.
translation.zh: 我知道 别这样

translation.en: [Jennifer] The truth is, I really started to think I was gonna get nominated.
translation.zh: 其实我真的觉得我会被提名

translation.en: I got my hopes up because so many people were telling me I would be.
translation.zh: 我抱有希望 因为很多人说我会得到提名

translation.en: And then it didn't happen.
translation.zh: 然后我没被提名

translation.en: And I had to ask myself, what does that mean?
translation.zh: 我不得不问自己 这意味着什么？

translation.en: [Jennifer] I do this not for an award.
translation.zh: 我这么做不是为了得奖

translation.en: Or to do my hits up there
translation.zh: 或者大跳特跳

translation.en: and seem like I'm the best performer in the world.
translation.zh: 好像我是世界上最厉害的表演者一样

translation.en: No, I do this to… tell stories.
translation.zh: 不 我做这件事情 是为了讲故事

translation.en: And to effect change and to connect with people
translation.zh: 是为了产生改变 是为了和别人产生联系

translation.en: and make them feel things because I wanna feel something.
translation.zh: 让他们产生感触 因为我也想产生一些感觉

translation.en: That's why I do it,
translation.zh: 这才是我的初衷

translation.en: because I actually wanna make the world a better place in my own little way.
translation.zh: 因为我确实想用自己的方式 让世界变得更美好

translation.en: At the end of the day, when somebody meets you,
translation.zh: 到了最后 有人遇见我的时候

translation.en: they don't go, "Oh my God, you have 12 Grammys." They don't say that.
translation.zh: 他们不会说：“天啊 你有12个格莱美奖” 他们不会这样说

translation.en: They go, "Oh my God, that song you wrote made me feel and got me through."
translation.zh: 他们会说：“天啊 你写的那首歌 让我有共鸣 帮我度过难关”

translation.en: "When I saw you on stage, I realized I could be there too."
translation.zh: “当我看到你登上舞台 我意识到我也可以站在那里”

translation.en: -I'm gonna keep working. -[Parris] One, two, three…
translation.zh: 我会一直工作

translation.en: [Jennifer] And I'm gonna be unafraid to get loud
translation.zh: 我会无畏地大声唱歌

translation.en: and use my voice in the best way that I can.
translation.zh: 尽我所能地使用我的声音

translation.en: [Tabitha] They're saying 18 cages on the field.
translation.zh: 他们说场上有18个笼子

translation.en: -Eighteen? -[Tabitha] Yeah.
[Jennifer] Who's making the decision, Bruce?
translation.zh: 是谁做的决定呢 布鲁斯吗？

translation.en: And Ha… Bruce and Hamish and team.
translation.zh: 我觉得是布鲁斯、哈米什和团队做的

translation.en: And I don't know if there were logistics that played into this and…
translation.zh: 我不知道是不是 有什么后勤方面的原因

translation.en: We're here trying to make this work, and every day, I turn around
translation.zh: 我们想促成这个创意 每一天 只要我稍不注意

translation.en: with somebody giving me some negative energy about,
translation.zh: 就会有人会给我传播负能量

translation.en: "We can't have this. We can't have that."

translation.en: so for anyone to give you feedback that we keep saying no is unfair.

translation.en: We have a responsibility for getting it on and off the field in seven minutes and--

translation.en: But the finale can't be just one minute.

translation.en: It's a song.

translation.en: It has a build.

translation.en: I'm trying to give you something with substance,

translation.en: not just us out there shaking our fucking asses

translation.en: and fucking belly dancing.

translation.en: I want something real, something that's gonna make a statement,

translation.en: that's gonna say we belong here and that we have something to offer.

translation.en: That's what I want to do, and that's what I'm trying to do.

translation.en: I can't do it if you guys keep pressing us for fucking seconds and minutes,

translation.en: and we're fighting. I don't want to fight.
translation.zh: 我们在吵架 我不想吵架

translation.en: [Ricky] Okay. Well, I will have a conversation with them.

translation.en: although it would seem, like, scary for a lot of people,

translation.en: she doesn't feel nervous because she's next to me.

translation.en: So she knows that she's gonna be safe up there.

translation.en: and you tell every little girl in the world to get loud

translation.en: from bringing light to injustice."

translation.en: [tearfully] That was a big part of it for me.

translation.en: because I'm proud to be an American, but also I am not just American.

translation.en: about immigration.

translation.en: to be able to perform on the world's biggest stage.

translation.en: -[dancers] Parris! -[group cheering, applauding]

translation.en: ♪ My head's killing me, I'm losing sleep ♪
translation.zh: （詹妮弗和她14岁的双胞胎孩子 住在洛杉矶）

translation.en: ♪ And I'm waking up tired of it all ♪
translation.zh: （她最近成立了Limitless Labs 其核心使命是为弱势群体）

translation.en: ♪ Early in the morning And it's starting already ♪
translation.zh: （争取权利 提供工作机会）

translation.en: [Jennifer] It's great to be back here, home in the Bronx with all of you.
translation.zh: 很高兴回到这里 回到布朗克斯的家跟你们在一起

translation.en: It's a tremendous responsibility always
translation.zh: 能为社群做事

translation.en: what I can do for my community.
translation.zh: 永远都是个巨大的责任

translation.en: And I really wanted to empower every woman to create the most beautiful life
translation.zh: 我想激励所有女性都能尽全力

translation.en: that they could for themselves, whatever that meant for them.
translation.zh: 为自己创造最美好的生活 不管这对她们来说有什么意义

translation.en: -And money here. -[woman] Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 还有钱

translation.en: 'Cause we need that too, and y'all got money, so…
translation.zh: 因为我们也需要钱 你们都挣到钱 所以…

translation.en: [Jennifer] But seriously, as the CEO of Goldman Sachs,
translation.zh: 但说真的 作为高盛的首席执行官

translation.en: it's a very smart business play for you guys.
translation.zh: 我要说这对你们来说 是非常明智的商业策略

translation.en: It's a smart thing for you to invest in people like us
translation.zh: 投资于我们这样的人是明智的

translation.en: because we know what our communities want more than anybody.
translation.zh: 因为我们比任何人 都了解我们社群的需求

translation.en: I believe you're investing about $100 million
translation.zh: 你投资大概一亿美元

translation.en: and putting it into the communities for Black women.
translation.zh: 投入到黑人女性社区

translation.en: And I would love to do that with Latinas as well.
translation.zh: 我也想把这个方法用到拉丁人身上

translation.en: All you've built over a long time
translation.zh: 你这么长时间以来创造的东西

translation.en: can really amplify this, you know, even more than we can.
translation.zh: 能够增强影响 甚至比我们的作用还大

translation.en: When you're that person…
translation.zh: 当你是那个人…

translation.en: When you realize over and over you're, like, the only woman in the room
translation.zh: 当你一遍又一遍意识到 自己是房间里唯一的女人

translation.en: or you're the only Latina, what it made me think is
translation.zh: 或者是唯一的拉丁裔 就会致使我去思考

translation.en: that maybe I was the first Latina woman to be in that room,
translation.zh: 也许我是那个房间里 第一个拉丁裔女性

translation.en: but I wasn't gonna be the last.
translation.zh: 但我不会是最后一个

translation.en: That was awesome. That was really, really inspiring.
translation.zh: 太棒了 真是鼓舞人心

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢
